badged_color_label.description: This string is used as name for the badged color label.

blocked_html_body.description: This string is used as body on the blocked site page.
blocked_html_body.message: This site was blocked by the ClearURLs Add-on, because we identify this site as an advertising and/or tracking service. To visit this site, you must temporarily deactivate the Add-on or disable domain blocking in the ClearURLs settings. After this you can click on the button below to load the page.

blocked_html_button.description: This string is used as button on the blocked site page.

blocked_html_title.description: This string is used as title on the blocked site page.

check_os_log.description: This string is used on ClearURLs log startup.

cleaning_tool_btn.description: This string is used as name for the clean url button.

cleaning_tool_clean_urls_label.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page for the clean URLs.
cleaning_tool_clean_urls_label.message: Here you can find the cleaned URLs:

cleaning_tool_description.description: This string is used as description of the cleaning tool.
cleaning_tool_description.message: With this tool you can paste in URLs and ClearURLs will clean the URLs after a click on the green button. You can paste in multiple URLs at once, but every URL must be on a separate line.

cleaning_tool_dirty_urls_label.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page for the dirty URLs.
cleaning_tool_dirty_urls_label.message: Here you can paste in the dirty URLs:

cleaning_tool_page_title.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page.

clipboard_copy_link.description: This string is used in the context menu to copy clean links.

configs_switch_statistics.description: This string is used as name for the statistics switch button on the popup page.

configs_switch_statistics_title.description: This string is used as title for the statistics switch button on the popup page.
configs_switch_statistics_title.message: Activate or deactivate the statistics function

context_menu_enabled.description: This string is used toggle the context menu entry to copy clean links.

context_menu_enabled_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

core_error.description: This string is used to tell the user, that ClearURLs could not be started.

core_save_on_disk.description: This string is used to tell the user, that ClearURLs saved the settings on disk.

domain_blocking_enabled.description: This string is used as label for the domain blocking switch
domain_blocking_enabled.message: Allow domain blocking (Can lead to problems on pages that do not allow AdBlockers)

domain_blocking_enabled_title.description: This string is used as title for the domain blocking switch
domain_blocking_enabled_title.message: Allow domain blocking (Can lead to problems on pages that do not allow AdBlockers)

donate_button.description: This string is used to refer to a donation page.
donate_button.message: A donation for the ClearURLs creator.

eTag_filtering_enabled.description: This string is used as label for the ETag header filtering switch
eTag_filtering_enabled.message: Filters ETag headers from requests (See also this article)

eTag_filtering_enabled_title.description: This string is used as title for the ETag header filtering switch
eTag_filtering_enabled_title.message: Filters ETag headers. Hint: Cache must be cleared before first use.

eTag_filtering_log.description: This string is used on ETag header filtering in the ClearURLs log.
eTag_filtering_log.message: ETag header was removed from this request

error_report_url.message: It seems like this URL has already been reported.

hash_status_code_1.description: This status code says, that no update is available for the ClearURLs rules and everything is up to date.

hash_status_code_2.description: This status code says, that the ClearURLs rules are successfully updated.

hash_status_code_3.description: This status code says, that an update is available for the ClearURLs rules.

hash_status_code_4.description: This status code says, that the ClearURLs could not be started correctly.

hash_status_code_5.description: This status code says, that an error occurred while updating the ClearURLs rules.

history_listener_enabled.description: This string is used as name for the history API listener label.
history_listener_enabled.message: Prevent tracking injection over history API (See also: The replaceState() method)

local_hosts_skipping.description: This string is used as label for the local host skipping switch

local_hosts_skipping_title.description: This string is used as title for the local host skipping switch

log_domain_blocked.description: This string is used on blocked domains in the ClearURLs log.

log_html_export_button.description: This string is used for the export button on the log page.

log_html_export_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the export button on the log page.

log_html_import_button.description: This string is used for the import button on the log page.

log_html_import_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the import button on the log page.

log_html_page_title.description: This string is used as header on the log page.

log_html_reset_button.description: This string is used for the reset button on the log page.

log_html_reset_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the reset button on the log page.

log_html_table_head_1.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_2.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_3.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_4.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_ping_blocked.description: This string is used on hyperlink auditing in the ClearURLs log.

log_redirect.description: This string is used on redirections in the ClearURLs log.

ping_blocking_enabled.description: This string is used as label for the hyperlink auditing blocking switch
ping_blocking_enabled.message: Block hyperlink auditing (See also this article)

ping_blocking_enabled_title.description: This string is used as title for the hyperlink auditing blocking switch

popup_html_configs_head.description: This string is used as title for the configs on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_head_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

popup_html_configs_switch_badges.description: This string is used as name for the badges switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_badges_title.description: This string is used as title for the badges switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_filter.description: This string is used as name for the filter switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_filter_title.description: This string is used as title for the filter switch button on the popup page.
popup_html_configs_switch_filter_title.message: The filters switch activates the cleaning functionality of ClearURLs. If you disable this option, the whole addon is disabled

popup_html_configs_switch_log.description: This string is used as name for the logging switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_log_title.description: This string is used as title for the logging switch button on the popup page.
popup_html_configs_switch_log_title.message: The log is saved only locally. We advise against this feature if you do not need it

popup_html_log_head.description: This string is used as name for the log button on the popup page.

popup_html_log_head_title.description: This string is used as title for the log button on the popup page.

popup_html_report_button_title.message: Report the current URL from this tab.

popup_html_rules_status_head.description: This string is used as title for the rules-status section on the popup page.

popup_html_rules_status_head_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

popup_html_statistics_blocked.description: This string is used as name for the blocked elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_blocked_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

popup_html_statistics_elements.description: This string is used as name for the elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_elements_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

popup_html_statistics_head.description: This string is used as title for the statistics on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_head_title.description: not needed, only to prevent exceptions

popup_html_statistics_percentage.description: This string is used as name for the percentage of blocked elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_reset_button.description: This string is used as name for the statistics reset button on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_reset_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the statistics reset button on the popup page.

referral_marketing_enabled.description: This string is used as label for the referral marketing switch

referral_marketing_enabled_title.description: This string is used as title for the referral marketing switch

setting_hash_url_label.description: This string is used as name for the rule.hash url label.
setting_hash_url_label.message: The url to the rules.hash file (hash)

setting_html_export_button.description: This string is used as name for the export button on the settings page.

setting_html_export_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the export button on the settings page.

setting_html_import_button.description: This string is used as name for the reset button on the settings page.

setting_types_label.description: This string is used as name for the types label.

settings_html_page_title.description: This string is used as title on the settings page.

settings_html_save_button.description: This string is used as name for the save&reload button on the settings page.

settings_html_save_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the save&reload button on the settings page.

success_report_url.message: The URL was successfully reported. We will check this URL soon.

watchdog.description: This string is used as text for the watchdog
watchdog.message: [ClearURLs]: The watchdog has detected a problem and has already failed $TIMES$ times.
